text:
sauSha#dhIqranu# ruddhyasE | 
garBEq sa~jjA#yasEq puna#H || 
garBO# aqsyOSha#dhInAqM garBOq vanaqspatI#nAM | 
garBOq viSva#sya BUqtasyAgnEq garBO# aqpAma#si || 
praqsadyaq Basma#nAq yOni#maqpaSca# pRuthiqvIma#gnE | 
saq(gm)qsRujya# mAqtRuBiqstvaM jyOti#ShmAqn punaqrA&sa#daH || 
puna#rAqsadyaq sada#namaqpaSca# pRuthiqvIma#gnE | 
SEShE# mAqturyathOqpasthEq &ntaraqsyA(gm) Siqvata#maH || 
puna#rUqrjA - [  ] 12
